definition: the Band-tightening Spell (in 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4])/a spell or incantation for controlling sb
to hoop/to put a hoop around sth
hooped barrel/to handmake a wooden barrel

sentences.english: The most common form of web reinforcement used is the vertical stirrup.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的形式箍筋採用的是垂直箍筋。

sentences.english: The most common form of web reinforcement used is the vertical stirrup.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的形式箍筋採用的是垂直箍筋。

sentences.english: Hand hooping with a hula hoop is fun because of the large number of possibilities for variety in tricks.
sentences.chinese: 手用呼拉圈套箍，是因爲各種可能性大批過關樂趣。

sentences.english: On Combination of Relevance Principle and Politeness Principle in Business Context;
sentences.chinese: 關聯性原則是廣告人無法擺脫的一個緊箍。

sentences.english: The canned goods are to be packed in carton with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 罐狀貨物在紙箱裏，外面加兩道箍。

sentences.english: Of roots at the top and the much-scratched metal ferrule and spike at the base.
sentences.chinese: 根頂部和急需抓傷的金屬箍和扣球的基礎。

sentences.english: The hoop cable, the welding joint and the groove of the drum body keep on a plane.
sentences.chinese: 箍索及焊接連接點與鼓身的凹槽保持一個平面。

sentences.english: What if the dentist says my child needs braces?
sentences.chinese: 牙醫如果說孩子需要戴牙箍，怎麼辦？

sentences.english: These hoop earrings are savvy and spunky and love to be worn frequently.
sentences.chinese: 這些箍耳環是精明的，有勇氣，喜歡佩戴頻繁。

sentences.english: It was time for me to work on the hoops and battens.
sentences.chinese: 現在是我在安放箍和壓條。

sentences.english: Thee canned goods are to be packed in cartons with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 罐裝貨物在紙箱裏，外面加兩道箍。

sentences.english: The plackets of the stirrups should be settled right on the upper part of the beams and in staggered arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 梁的箍筋的開口必須放在梁的上部且應交錯放置。

sentences.english: The effect of stirrups and plates on SRC joint has also been discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中還論證了節點箍筋的作用和錨板錨固性能。

sentences.english: Participants should bring their own sticks, mouth guard, shin pads.
sentences.chinese: 參加者需要自備球棍，牙箍，護脛。

sentences.english: She wore a band round her hair.
The canned goods are to be packed in cartons with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 罐裝貨物在紙箱裏，拖戽加兩道箍。

definition: to fasten tightly with a hoop
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
